metadata.title: Bose Soundwear Companion Cover, Blue
features: Acoustically transparent, high quality cover to protect your Bose sound wear companion speaker
Four-way stretches to fit the speaker snugly
Built to keep moisture and dust out
description: Bose looked at all the ways you might use your sound wear companion speaker and designed an acoustically transparent, high quality cover to protect it, so nothing gets between you and the sound. This cover is Four-Way stretchable, fits the speaker snugly with zero crinkles and zero static, and keeps moisture and dust out -so you can wear it all day.
